bio.description: I have a degree in Production Engineering from UNIVESP and currently work as a Full-stack Developer. I consistently adhere to implementing solid programming practices, including the SOLID principles, and integrate automated testing into all the projects I engage in. This approach not only enhances the quality of the code but also contributes to the reliability and robustness of the systems I develop. I am continually seeking ways to refine my skills and deliver efficient, innovative solutions.

mutant.description: Working as a Full Stack Developer at Mutant, allocated to Telef√¥nica Vivo, contributing to the development and improvement of Vivo app journeys.
mutant.activity1: Development of various journeys in the Vivo app, such as Technical Support, Vivo Travel, SIM Card Exchange, e-SIM, Invoice Negotiation.
mutant.activity2: Part of a squad dedicated to Order Tracking and Smart Home journeys.

marttech.description: Worked on the development of the Curar Sa√∫de platform, an innovative solution offering mini-courses, educational videos, and interactive challenges.
marttech.activity1: Created modern and responsive interfaces with TypeScript, React, and Material UI.
marttech.activity2: Implemented efficient state management using React Hooks and Context API.
marttech.activity3: Configured CI/CD pipelines and deployed on the Azure DevOps platform.

xmart.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer on the xGuardian security application (AppSec) and the company's institutional landing page.
xmart.activity1: Developed interfaces with React, using libraries like Shadcn/ui and Tailwind.
xmart.activity2: Implemented APIs with Python and FastAPI, integrating MySQL and MariaDB databases.
xmart.activity3: Contributed to the UI/UX renewal of the Institutional Landing Page.

vtal.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer at V.tal, contributing to strategic projects focused on system maintenance, development, and innovation.
vtal.activity1: Maintained and fixed bugs in a legacy system (Operational Portal).
vtal.activity2: Participated in the planning and development of the new version of the Access Management module.
vtal.activity3: Contributed to the planning and development of a Technical Support module for operators.
vtal.activity4: Developed a static site for API documentation (Developer Portal).

gama.description: Selected to participate in an immersion and learning program in an agile squad as a back-end developer for 45 days. At the end of the program, my squad was awarded 1st place.
gama.activity1: Built the API for an LMS educational platform with multiple-choice questionnaires.
